events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and the resume looks promising with solid development experience.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's extensive background in software development and devops tools.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate through the hiring process for the developer role.
Initial screening call completed successfully; the candidate demonstrated good knowledge of software engineering principles and relevant technologies.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to the screening feedback and expressed excitement to proceed to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for next week, focusing on coding skills, system design, and devops experience.
